subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Indiana Coach Kelvin Sampson will not receive a $500,000 raise and his team will lose one scholarship for next season after violating N.C.A.A.-imposed sanctions on phone calls. The action announced by the university yesterday was the second time in 17 months he had been penalized for improper telephone calls.
